name: asphalting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of covering an area with asphalt (= a black, sticky substance that forms a hard surface): The road is due for asphalting.
the asphalt surface of a road or area: The cab bumped along on the cracked asphalting.
More examplesFewer examplesHe despairs at the asphalting of so much public space.Asphalting is shortly to take place in the street.Demolition of old sheds and railway lines will be followed by asphalting of the quay area.
